Code Snippet

released

Default

  
    oc new-project knativetutorial
    oc adm policy add-scc-to-user privileged -z default
    oc adm policy add-scc-to-user anyuid -z default

No Padding (Bottom)

  
    oc new-project knativetutorial
    oc adm policy add-scc-to-user privileged -z default
    oc adm policy add-scc-to-user anyuid -z default

No Padding (Top)

  
    oc new-project knativetutorial
    oc adm policy add-scc-to-user privileged -z default
    oc adm policy add-scc-to-user anyuid -z default
